content.prompt: The excerpt best reflects which of the following historical situations in the early 1800s?

choices.label: The innovations in the market revolution creating new wealth for Americans
The emergence of a new and distinctive American culture
The transition of the United States to a more participatory democracy
The importance of reading literacy among Americans

topic.text: 4.9: The Development of an American Culture

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
